A Appendix A.1 Estimating the marginal replacement vehicles We report rough estimates of the fuel efficiency of the marginal replacement vehicle, using the potential outcome framework with never-takers (NT), compliers (C), and always-takers (AT). We consider this framework in the context of the intent-to-treat in with the difference-indifference specification.
